name: Frog Bartender
description:
Tutorial:

WASD    Mobile

space     teleport

J    get item

L     reduce items

I    serve

T/Y     decrease/increase volume

Touch the rubbish left by the guest to remove

The upper right corner shows the score and the upper

 left corner is the acquired item

Give extra points for what guests need Deduct points for mistakes or overtime

middle is time  you need to get a higher score in three minutes
